title: vINAbhErI vENu vAdyAdi
sahitya:
vINAbhEri vENu vAdyAdi vinOdinI mOdinI rakSa mAm


caraNam    ghONI vadanAdi vinuta caritE guNa rahitE vidhi guruguha mahitE
ENI lOcani pApa vimOcani indirEsha sahOdari talOdari
(ciTTasvara)
